entry.title: $2400 // 2 BR apt off Central Park West close to Columbia University and subway
entry.content: 2 BR apt with 1 bath close to Columbia University. Apartment is located off Central Park West. Subway is very close to the apartment and midtown Manhattan is a 15 minute train ride away. All rooms have windows. The layout is very nice with bedrooms at either end of the apartment. Plenty of closets. Elevator building with live in Super. Utilities extra depending on electricity and cooking gas usage.
